name: PANGAEA
overview:
PANGAEA Internet Marketing Ltd. is a full service internet marketing agency based in the Netherlands. PANGAEA is highly experienced and able to make all its clients successful on the internet thanks to an extensive knowledge of internet marketing.

When PANGAEA started in 1995, it was one of the first internet marketing agencies in the Netherlands. PANGAEA has always used this head start to exceed expectations and guarantee internet success for its clients.

PANGAEA forms a part of KMGroup Ltd., an internet investment company with stakes in internet businesses such as Deep Graphic Design for unique designs and interaction design, Dutch Learning for eLearning applications, SmartReach for search engine marketing and PANGAEA Internet Marketing for internet marketing consultancy.

KMGroup also launches its own initiatives in cooperation with clients. Examples are NBSNederland, VCANederland, Zamante, Kortingisleuk.nl, BHVNederland, Professional Translation and VideoBoard. The internet is so important to these initiatives, that both parties benefit when KMGroup owns stakes. The advantage of this arrangement is that KMGroup and PANGAEA are always ahead with internet developments. New technologies are first tested in a ‘home environment’ and then deployed with a detailed ROI in the client’s environment.

PANGAEA is one of the top 5 internet marketing agencies in the Netherlands. Together, KMGroup and PANGAEA have 46 employees.

milestones.description: All footballers unite, Zamante.com is now live! Zamante brings athletes, clubs, trainers and scouts closer together. PANGAEA has built this revolutionary network.
